element.hint: If checked, enables an integrated search to dynamically update the condition applied to the table.
element.label: Enable Search
element.name: enable_search

element.hint: List of groups to restrict access to.
element.label: Groups
element.name: groups

element.hint: The primary display label for the tab.
element.label: Label
element.name: label

element.hint: If checked, the tab will not be shown if there are zero records matching all of the filters.
element.label: Omit if no records
element.name: omit_if_no_records

element.hint: The order from left to right that this tab will appear relative to other tabs for the widget instance.
element.label: Order
element.name: order

element.hint: Placeholder text displayed in the search bar.
element.label: Placeholder
element.name: placeholder

element.hint: List of roles to restrict access to.
element.label: Roles
element.name: roles

element.hint: Condition to apply when searching. Use ${query} to access the query string entered.
element.label: Search Condition
element.name: search_condition

element.hint: When selected, enables an HTML field to display above the tab's widget.
element.label: Show Instructions
element.name: show_instructions

element.hint: The widget to embed in the tab.
element.label: Widget
element.name: widget

element.hint: The widget instance where this tab is visible.
element.label: Widget Instance
element.name: widget_instance

element.hint: Name/value pairs to use as widget input options for the chosen widget.
element.label: Widget Options
element.name: widget_options
